Summary Note:
Carlotta Emanuela Giordano and the RM crossed paths at a tech conference in Rome. They attended several keynote sessions together and realized they had a shared vision for the future of technology investments.
Having worked for over 45 years, Carlotta Emanuela Giordano brings a wealth of experience and expertise to her current role. She is known for her strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
She decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Carlotta Emanuela Giordano and Malatesta have been married since 1989. They are proud parents of 2 children: Fantini and Giorgia.
Education Background:
In 1974, Carlotta graduated from Liceo Classico Annibale Mariotti Siena with a secondary school diploma.
Carlotta received her degree from University of Turin in 1966.
Occupation History:
Having worked for over 45 years, Carlotta Emanuela Giordano brings a wealth of experience and expertise to her current role. She is known for her strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
In 1980, Carlotta Emanuela Giordano started working as a Drilling Engineer at ERGA S.p.A., marking the beginning of her successful career.
At Edison S.p.A., she held the position of Reservoir Engineer from 1985 to 1986, making significant contributions to the organization.
From 1987 to 1991, she served as a Operations Manager at SNAM S.p.A., solidifying her position as a leader in the industry.
She appointment as a VP of Exploration at Edison S.p.A. in 1991 marked a significant milestone in her career, as she took on increasingly complex challenges and delivered exceptional results.
Carlotta Emanuela Giordano retired after holding the position of CEO at Edison S.p.A. from 1994 to 2017.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 2000000 EUR, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
Client does not have any properties.She does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: In summary, Carlotta has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
